What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items.
What was great: It was nice to know that when I order the books will be coming in about a week, even with the holidays.
Additional Comments: It is nice you send an alternative item if one is not in stock at the time.

What could we improve: December book orders need to come earlier, they end up coming too close to winter break, sometimes I can't get them to families in time.
You did great!
One hardcover book was damaged when it arrived.

What was great: The ordering process was easy for families and the books came in good time.
Additional Comments: For books shipped to school, there used to be "tear away" lists for each kid's books. This made separating the orders easier. The box did contain a shipping list, with names of students and books, but the "tear away" list was nice to keep with the order once sorted.

What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items.
What could we improve: I was missing a book.
I thought my student's order would make it to school before our Christmas break.
Additional Comments: I do believe orders before December 9, 2022 should have been delivered to school before Christmas break.

What was great: It was easy to check my students' orders and finalize my order.

What could we improve: One of my students placed an order the day after my deadline. Scholastic allowed them to place the order, so I submitted their order the next day. That was on December the 7th. The order still says "processing". My order that I placed on December 6th arrived to my school on December 21st. I am disappointed that the second order is still just processing and concerned about it arriving to my student.
Additional Comments: I submitted something about my second order that is processing, but have not heard anything back yet.

What could we improve: One of the book covers was practically ripped off because another book was jammed inside it.

What was great: ease or ordering and quick delivery
Ease of use of site - delivery was quick !
Additional Comments: Keep doing what you are doing ! Delivery is so much better this year !

What Issues: I have not received a package.
What could we improve: Better communication with shipping and shipping issues. Do not send an email with tracking information if the package has not been shipped.
Additional Comments: Very disappointed. I ordered books for my students as a holiday gift on 12/6. On 12/7 I received that they had shipped and would be delivered by 12/8. When I tracked the shipment and it said processing for 2 weeks. I have still not received the package. If there was an issue with the shipment it would have been nice to get an email explaining the issue.
I would love to be able to purchase Dr. Seuss books from you!

What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items.
What was great: The quick response to my needs and FAST delivery
Additional Comments: While my order WAS missing items, it was rectified immediately and customer service was very prompt and helpful!!

What was great: Ordering was easy and the order came in a timely manner.

What could we improve: Delivered the package on time

What was great: The ease if ordering and the speediness of delivery.

What could we improve: Let me know when it was delivered.
Much better this year! However the shipping minimum makes it tougher on student families
was a mistake- did not mean that low.. but the number of books ordered was too many- and i could not fix it- too challenging to figure out
Additional Comments: 11 books were ordered i only wanted 6 once i realized i made a mistake it was too late used bonus points so did not cost actual money but still frustrating

What was great: It was a super quick turn around.  You want to give parents enough time to order but some of the books kids want are seasonal so it's nice when the turn around time is quick so they can get the books they want before that season is over.

What could we improve: Better packaging. Books were damaged when they arrived because the box was crunched on the corner.
Nothing
Box came smashed.  All books arrived bent.

Can you bring back the perforated sections on the packing list?  Sometimes my class has a large order - I loved the perforated sections that I could lay out and sort the books easier into piles.  It was very inconvenient.  Maybe it sounds like a small thing, but it's a timesaver and, over the course of a school year, all that time is a biggee!
Additional Comments: UPS seems to be more reliable and timely than when my order begins with UPS and then is given to the USPS.

What could we improve: When I submit my class's order and I have earned a $ reward, it would be nice if I could easily access the catalog to make a choice for my reward instead of having to get out of the "checkout" section.

What was great: Easy-to-navigate website, great customer service, and wonderful books at a reasonable price!
Additional Comments: I really appreciate the ability to earn points and use them to buy books for my classroom. Thank you for always being a trusted, customer-focused company!

What could we improve: Delivered my books.
Additional Comments: I would like my items.

What could we improve: The last time I ordered it took so long to get my books my parents got us set.

What was great: I got my order quickly and before winter break!
The turnaround time was VERY quick!  I received the order in a very timely manner?

What could we improve: It would be very helpful if the individual orders were packaged together instead of having to piece together my and my student's orders
Books didn't arrive for holiday distribution.
Additional Comments: While I could track my shipment, it seemed to stall at different points along the way.

What could we improve: Bring back the YA flyer

What was great: The tracking system on the packaging is very accurate!
Additional Comments: N/A

What was great: I was able to place my order easily and I received it in the promised time, in perfect condition.

What Issues: bent covers on a few books
What could we improve: More variety with book choices - not enough quality literature being offered-
Additional Comments: there needs to be more book choices- I'm looking for good literature for my kids to read

What could we improve: I had to call and request flyers which took 3 weeks to come in which interrupted our holiday ordering plans.

What was great: Easy to order online for parents

What could we improve: Whenever UPS turns the package over to USPS there's a long delay in receiving the package.

What was great: Easy to order and quick shipping
Speedy, efficient, all there, great books!
Additional Comments: We. Love. Scholastic Books. ‼️

What could we improve: I would like to see a larger selection of graphic novels.
My book box never came before Christmas break for my students.

What Issues: I have not received a package.
What could we improve: Books have not been delivered

What was great: The order came so quickly! Less than a week!

What could we improve: Shipping times were fantastic! Items ordered were all there. Great work! A parent order books and wanted them shipped to their home. I received the order at my home when it had her address but both of our names were on the label. Should have only had the parent's name. Minor mistake.

Additional Comments: So glad the shipping and ordering is back to normal.

What could we improve: Better shipping time- the company you use runs LATE beyond their own tracking info

What was great: It was delivered quickly and accurately. Thank you!
Additional Comments: Thank you for working hard to get your deliveries back on track!  It’s much appreciated:)

What could we improve: My books did not arrive in time to give to my students before the school week ended. I receive an email saying I’d receive them Tuesday. On Friday they still hadn’t arrived.
Additional Comments: I have been on break for a week. I have no idea if I’ve even received the books yet, or it the order is correct

What was great: The order came in a timely fashion.

Additional Comments: It would be great if we could enter a coupon code even after placing an order.  It’s so easy to forget when managing a classroom.  It’s a shame to lose the points.

What could we improve: I never received my order

What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items.
Additional Comments: I called about a missing item.  The rep was very accommodating and assured me it would be mailed the next day.  It was and arrived before our last day of school

What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items.,My order was delivered late
What could we improve: I paid the additional amount to have my order delivered faster and at least 3 or 4 items were not delivered with the rest. The 3 items eventually arrived, but it took an additional two weeks to receive them. I was told you could not expedite the second delivery even though it was Scholastic who delayed the delivery I paid extra to receive quicker. I will not use that service again as I can see there is no guarantee of quicker service for the entire order.

Additional Comments: I love Scholastic Book Clubs!

What was great: Delivery was fast.   I do have a major concern. May of my parents who order don’t speak English and don’t understand how to put coupon codes in. Many have lost out on their free $5 books because of this. I hope you can fix your system that it automatically adds it to the parents account instead of them adding the code in.  Please try to make this easier for families who speak limited English and or are in a rush
Additional Comments: Delivery was fast.   I do have a major concern. May of my parents who order don’t speak English and don’t understand how to put coupon codes in. Many have lost out on their free $5 books because of this. I hope you can fix your system that it automatically adds it to the parents account instead of them adding the code in.  Please try to make this easier for families who speak limited English and or are in a rush

What was great: Orders have come very quickly with no damage or missing items!
Additional Comments: None this year!!

What could we improve: My order included Christmas presents for my students and I did not receive them before we went on winter break.

Additional Comments: Need to update bonus catalog and offer more points

What could we improve: I still haven’t received my package.
Additional Comments: My package still hasn’t arrived

What could we improve: I have yet to receive my order. My students will get their books now after the holiday
Have the books wrapped per child’s order The website is sometimes confusing and brings you to places you didn’t need/want to go to

What was great: Easy ordering through one of your representatives

Additional Comments: I have not been receiving catalogs, unless request them online.  (I did place an order in September, which online it states then I would receive subsequent catalogs.   I've never had this problem in previous years.)
Very satisfied!!!!  Online is easy too!!!!
